  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.ModelCon, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.ModelGraphInterface, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFReaderF, com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFWriterF, com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.Lock, com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.PrefixMapping

    public class ModelD2RQ
extends com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.impl.ModelCom
implements com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model

    A D2RQ read-only Jena model backed by a D2RQ-mapped non-RDF database.

    D2RQ is a declarative mapping language for describing mappings between ontologies and relational data models. More information about D2RQ is found at: http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/bizer/d2rq/

    This class is a thin wrapper around a GraphD2RQ and provides only convenience constructors.

    Author:
    Chris Bizer chris@bizer.de, Richard Cyganiak (richard@cyganiak.de)
    See Also:
    GraphD2RQ

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelD2RQ

        public ModelD2RQ(String mapURL)
        Create a non-RDF database-based model. The model is created from a D2RQ map that will be loaded from the given URL. Its serialization format will be guessed from the file extension and defaults to RDF/XML.
        Parameters:
        mapURL - URL of the D2RQ map to be used for this model

      • ModelD2RQ

        public ModelD2RQ(String mapURL,
         String serializationFormat,
         String baseURIForData)
        Create a non-RDF database-based model. The model is created from a D2RQ map that may be in "RDF/XML", "N-TRIPLES" or "TURTLE" format.
        Parameters:
        mapURL - URL of the D2RQ map to be used for this model
        serializationFormat - the format of the map, or null for guessing based on the file extension
        baseURIForData - Base URI for turning relative URI patterns into absolute URIs; if null, then D2RQ will pick a base URI

      • ModelD2RQ

        public ModelD2RQ(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model mapModel,
         String baseURIForData)
        Create a non-RDF database-based model. The model is created from a D2RQ map that is provided as a Jena model.
        Parameters:
        mapModel - a Jena model containing the D2RQ map
        baseURIForData - Base URI for turning relative URI patterns into absolute URIs; if null, then D2RQ will pick a base URI

      • ModelD2RQ

        public ModelD2RQ(Mapping mapping)
        Create a non-RDF database-based model. The model is created from the given D2RQ map.
